entry.title: Fwd: Block Size Increase Requirements
entry.summary: In an email exchange on May 31, 2015, Gavin Andresen requested real-world data from Yifu Guo regarding latency, bandwidth, and cost through the Great Firewall of China. This request followed a helpful post by Chung Wang that moved away from hypotheticals and focused on actual costs. Yifu Guo was invited to share any comments, questions, or grievances on the matter.
